projects.title: Leetcode Suggest
projects.description: A LeetCode problem tracking application that helps users monitor and manage their coding practice progress. The application provides features for tracking solved problems, viewing statistics, and getting AI-powered assistance on what to practice next.

projects.title: Accelerating Materials Discovery with AI
projects.description: Applied ML in material science by fine-tuning LLaMA on text-based representations of crystal structures and training graph neural networks on the QM9 dataset to predict molecular properties with improved accuracy. Developed efficient pipelines to convert complex structural data into formats suitable for large language models.

projects.title: Finger Detection and Count
projects.description: Used the Ultralytics YOLOv8 framework to train a custom object detection model that detects finger count on hands.

projects.title: Spotify Wrapped
projects.description: An Android app that integrates with Spotify and Firebase. It provides a music-focused experience where users can register/login, connect their Spotify account, and view personalized music data (like top tracks) in a visually rich, multi-screen interface.
